name: Built on Nothing
description: "Built on Nothing" is a humorous and cleverly crafted memecoin project that was developed on the fast, low-cost, and highly scalable Solana blockchain. It was originally launched as a playful satire, designed to poke fun at and highlight the widespread belief that many memecoins lack any real-world value, clear purpose, or functional utilityâ€”ultimately suggesting that they are, quite literally, built on nothing, yet still manage to build something meaningful.
